manifest.title: osTicket
manifest.author: osTicket Authors
manifest.description:
## About

osTicket is a widely-used open source support ticket system. It seamlessly integrates inquiries
created via email, phone and web-based forms into a simple easy-to-use multi-user web interface.
Manage, organize and archive all your support requests and responses in one place while providing
your customers with accountability and responsiveness they deserve.

## Features

* Dashboard Reports
* Configurable Help Topics
* Customer Support Portal
* Service Level Agreements
* Ticket Filters
* And Much More!
manifest.changelog:
* Update osTicket to 1.18.3

* security: Latest Patches 01/2026

fetch_email.command: echo '==> Fetching mails' && sudo -E -u www-data php /app/code/upload/api/cron.php

change-default-password.message: Change the admin email and password immediately.

manifest.postInstallMessage:
The admin interface is located at $CLOUDRON-APP-ORIGIN/scp/login.php . This app is pre-setup with an admin account. The initial credentials are: **Username**: root
**Password**: changeme
**Email**: admin@server.local
See the [admin checklist](https://cloudron.io/documentation/apps/osticket#admin-checklist) before starting to use the app. Agents must be manually added into osTicket before they can authenticate with the Cloudron User Directory. See [the docs](https://docs.cloudron.io/apps/osticket/#user-management) for more information.
